job.name: Anomaly_Detection_In_HDFS_Nodes
job.description: Detect anomalies in nodes reported in HDFS logs

task.name: Log_Parser
task.description: Extracts a group of event templates, whereby raw logs can be structured.

task.name: Feature_Vector_Extractor
task.description: Encodes structured data into numerical feature vectors whereby machine learning models can be applied.

task.name: Split_Data
task.description: Separate data into training and testing sets.

task.name: Predict_Model
task.description: Generate predictions using a trained model.

task.name: Visdom_Visualize_Results
task.description: Plot the different results obtained by a predictive model using Visdom

task.name: Visdom_Service_Actions
task.description: This task manages the life-cycle of Visdom PCA service. It allows to trigger the following action: Finish_Visdom. It requires the following variables: INSTANCE_ID: if used alone or; INSTANCE_NAME: if used within the same workflow as a Visdom_Service_Start task. In this case there is no need for an INSTANCE_ID. ACTION: the action to execute on the Visdom service among the aforementioned actions.

task.name: K_Means
task.description: K-means algorithm aims to partition n observations into k clusters in which each observation belongs to the cluster with the nearest mean, serving as a prototype of the cluster.

task.name: Start_Visdom_Service
task.description: Start the Visdom server as a service.

task.name: Wait_for_Signal
task.description: A template task that sends a ready notification for all the signals specified in the variable SIGNALS, then loops until one signal among those specified is received by the job.
